ce087092-cbd9-487f-897d-314784001a1f.description: Flings are free software tools created by VMware employees, and are innovative and experimental. Flings are great way to get customer feedback on early development, while providing customers with useful tools.
ce087092-cbd9-487f-897d-314784001a1f.name: Flings Technical Supporter

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the Flings developer must have added new features to, fixed bugs, etc. for more than 2 Flings.

d1df2823-16e7-47c8-8731-197bce0dc624.description: Borathon is VMware's hackathon where participants hack on their ideas for 48 hours to develop a prototype. Borathons are held multiple times during the year, globally or at various regional sites.
d1df2823-16e7-47c8-8731-197bce0dc624.name: Hackathon Winner

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the participant has earned the top/ grand prize or 1st place in any Borathon.

skills.name: Ability To Work Under Pressure In A Diverse Team

0e0abc5c-d678-40dd-8f07-c8721f61fb46.description: Flings are free software tools created by VMware employees, and are innovative and experimental. Flings are great way to get customer feedback on early development, while providing customers with useful tools.
0e0abc5c-d678-40dd-8f07-c8721f61fb46.name: Flings Developer

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the Flings developer must have released at least two Flings to the public, and have demonstrated innovated concepts, software development skills, and tools development.

c958c6cd-a190-4495-88ca-c03d1955a280.description: xLabs is the place for fast-tracking your innovative ideas to successful outcomes--where creativity meets execution. As a part of the Office of the CTO, xLabs invests and nurtures off-roadmap ideas, helping innovators execute with the focus and agility of a startup. We’re searching for inspired, curious, and collaborative innovators, who love to tackle hard problems that will shape VMware’s future. ​ The innovator and employee will earn this badge if they are accepted into an xLabs lite track.
c958c6cd-a190-4495-88ca-c03d1955a280.name: xLabs Lite-Track

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the innovator must have completed an xLabs Lite-Track program. The innovator must demonstrate innovative concepts, programming skills, and tools development.

2aec1ea2-096f-49e6-b855-d2f971b9cd77.description: Flings are free software tools created by VMware employees, and are innovative and experimental. Flings are great way to get customer feedback on early development, while providing customers with useful tools.
2aec1ea2-096f-49e6-b855-d2f971b9cd77.name: Flings Master

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the Flings developer must have released five or more Flings, and demonstrated innovative concepts with great software development skills, and tools development.

087052e9-fb07-4830-99fd-5ed06789de38.description: Borathon is VMware's hackathon where participants hack on their ideas for 48 hours to develop a prototype. Borathons are held multiple times during the year, globally or at various regional sites.

6df115f6-681b-4897-9ff2-5f83847134c1.description: Tech Talks is an internal communication channel, enabling all employees to communicate technical projects, processes, and innovation they are working on to the VMware internal community.
6df115f6-681b-4897-9ff2-5f83847134c1.name: Tech Talks

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the speaker must have presented a talk that was one of the top 10 viewed Tech Talks for a given year.

4f0397d0-c800-4d36-9f8b-af56761dff26.description: Sponsored by the Office of the CTO, RADIO is VMware’s annual R&D Innovation Offsite that brings together VMware’s technologists and leaders from around the world in the spirit of ingenuity and collaboration. During the event, employees come together to discuss novel ideas, explore new technologies and challenge each other to think differently about their work. For the last 20 years, RADIO has been a catalyst of innovation that celebrates human potential and forward-thinking ideas at VMware.
4f0397d0-c800-4d36-9f8b-af56761dff26.name: RADIO Research Poster Winner

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the recipient must have won the People's Choice Best Research Poster at VMware's R&D Innovation Offsite. Winners are selected by RADIO attendees through voting.

ec7f214d-8a9b-4e2e-aa05-1c9933e83522.description: xLabs is VMware's internal incubator to fast-track innovative ideas to successful outcomes. xLabs invests and nurtures off-roadmap ideas, helping innovators execute with the focus and agility of a startup.
ec7f214d-8a9b-4e2e-aa05-1c9933e83522.name: xLabs Full-Track

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the innovator must be accepted into an xLabs Full-Track program. The innovator must demonstrate innovative concepts, programming skills, and tools development.

f3162dba-22a5-4212-8334-2505b374dbee.description: RADIO. Research And Development Innovation Offsite, is VMware’s unique internal technical conference where we set out to connect, learn, and be inspired. Over the course of four days, more than 1,800 people coming from 26+ countries, share and discuss novel ideas, explore new opportunities, and challenge each other to think differently about the future and impact of our work.
f3162dba-22a5-4212-8334-2505b374dbee.name: RADIO Research Winner

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the participant must have won the best research poster or talk at VMware's R&D Innovation Offsite. Winners are selected by votes from all RADIO attendees.

a7ba040d-7fd1-46e2-82f4-9ee94293d3c2.description: Borathon is VMware’s quirky name for hackathon. It’s a part of our innovation DNA to reach into our creative roots to solve interesting problems. 7737322d-d889-4147-9507-acded86c5daf.description: The VMware Office of the CTO Excellence in Collaboration Award recognizes individuals who have consistently demonstrated collaborative behaviors, going above and beyond their responsibilities to help others.
7737322d-d889-4147-9507-acded86c5daf.name: VMware Office of the CTO Awards: Excellence in Collaboration

f8017816-efe7-4c6b-b4bb-aefbb00345ba.description: PE Champion Program is meant for senior technical talent partnering with the Principal Engineering Community for championship and career advocacy. This effort is meant to address our low representation of diversity.
f8017816-efe7-4c6b-b4bb-aefbb00345ba.name: PE Champion Program

badge_template_activities.title: Completing 6 month PE Champion Program and help grow and advocate for VMware’s diverse technical talent.

106b6e58-985d-4eb2-8e3b-c3b308d92f2f.description: The Pitchathon is an annual event sponsored by Kit Colbert in CPBU that is also open to anyone at VMware. It is a series of workshops and mentoring to learn how to pitch ideas. From a starting group of 24, 4 finalists are selected and 1 winner is selected. All participants are welcome to continue honing their ideas through xLabs, flings, and Borathons
106b6e58-985d-4eb2-8e3b-c3b308d92f2f.name: PITCH-A-THON Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: One of four finalists in the VMware Pitchathon, a four-month training and development program that prepares individuals with product ideas on how to pitch them to executives.

skills.name: Approaches Work In A Creative Way
